title: Organizational culture and leadership style in Spanish Hospitals: Effects on knowledge management and efficiency

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 20

Author(s): María-Jesús Moreno-Domínguez, Tomás Escobar-Rodríguez, Yolanda-María Pelayo-Díaz, Isabel Tovar-García
